extendedInfo.description: The classic game of Say It With Mime! finally reached Android!An easy game and very entertaining to play with a group of friends.- New Feature: Watch the trailer of the movie in YouTube!Entertainment assured to spend long hours having fun!Just choose a movie, set to run the clock and take the best actor inside of you!The one who has to act, can make the audience guess the name of the film by mimicking... or better yet... can act a part of the movie!In the case of not knowing the film, it is possible to read the synopsis of it!Once the time is over, if the audience guesses the film, they can risk the name of the actos to win extra points!The application has more than 3000 films!You can even watch the trailer of the movie in YouTube!Entertainment guaranteed!Show them who's the best actor...
